# Silence Dot ENV logs
DOTENV_CONFIG_QUIET=true

# Environment
MODE_ENV=production
NEXT_PUBLIC_MODE_ENV=production

# Ports
HOST_PORT=5000
NEXT_PUBLIC_CLIENT_PORT=3000

# URLs
HOST_URL=http://localhost:5000
NEXT_PUBLIC_CLIENT_URL=http://localhost:3000

# Secret Keys
SESSION_SECRET_KEY=session-secret0key
JWT_SECRET_KEY=jwt-secret0key

# Database Configurations
DB_LOCAL_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017
DB_LOCAL_NAME=database-local
DB_BASE_URI=mongodb+srv
DB_CLUSTER=database-cluster-url
DB_NAME=database-production
DB_USER=database-user
DB_PASSWORD=database-password
